title: Poland scrambles aircraft as Russia attacks Ukraine with hundreds of drones and missiles – Europe live
summary: Poland dispatched aircraft to safeguard its airspace in response to heightened tensions. This move came after Ukraine reported a significant Russian attack involving over 600 drones and missiles. The situation highlights the escalating military threats in the region.

title: World Athletics Championships 2025: Thiam out of heptathlon, USA miss men’s 4x400 final – live
summary: Luke McLaughlin provides updates from night eight in Tokyo, featuring exciting events in the decathlon and heptathlon. Viewers can also look forward to thrilling relay races. Stay tuned for the latest results and highlights from the competitions.

title: Liverpool v Everton: Premier League – live
summary: Liverpool aims to preserve their flawless league record in the upcoming Merseyside derby. Barry Glendenning will provide a minute-by-minute report of the match. Fans are eager to see if Liverpool can extend their winning streak.

title: UN security council fails to prevent ‘snapback’ nuclear sanctions on Iran
summary: The Iranian foreign ministry is advocating for continued diplomacy regarding international relations. It asserts that any return to the measures in place before the 2015 nuclear deal is both unlawful and unfounded. This statement reflects Iran's stance on ongoing negotiations and its opposition to reverting to previous agreements.

title: Merseyside derby buildup, Manchester United v Chelsea and more – as it happened
summary: Liverpool and Everton are set to clash in an upcoming Merseyside derby. Ahead of the Manchester United versus Chelsea match, managers Ruben Amorim and Enzo Maresca shared intriguing insights. The excitement builds as both rivalries approach in the Premier League.
